2642.verse: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ|And they ask you to hasten|205|232|9341$بِٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment.|127|182|12135$وَلَن|But never will|109|164|229$يُخْلِفَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah fail|119|146|769$وَعْدَهُۥ‌ۚ|(in) His Promise.|127|134|3372$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|112|713$يَوْمًا|a day|62|76|468$عِندَ|with|56|70|521$رَبِّكَ|your Lord|82|96|1322$كَأَلْفِ|(is) like a thousand|147|161|12136$سَنَةٍ|year(s)|68|75|908$مِّمَّا|of what|71|327|216$تَعُدُّونَ|you count.|92|348|12137$

2643.verse: وَكَأَيِّن|And how many|117|124|3344$مِّن|of|50|64|53$قَرْيَةٍ|a township|92|106|2319$أَمْلَيْتُ|I gave respite|112|126|12138$لَهَا|to it,|53|67|1226$وَهِىَ|while it|67|81|2320$ظَالِمَةٌ|(was) doing wrong.|148|155|8738$ثُمَّ|Then|53|103|293$أَخَذْتُهَا|I seized it|85|184|12139$وَإِلَىَّ|and to Me|87|186|12140$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|(is) the destination.|152|202|1162$

2645.verse: فَٱلَّذِينَ|So those who|111|122|3632$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|103|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|113|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds -|137|158|239$لَهُم|for them|76|97|98$مَّغْفِرَةٌ|(is) forgiveness|122|132|3290$وَرِزْقٌ|and a provision|120|364|7135$كَرِيمٌ|noble.|68|312|7136$

2646.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|134|42$سَعَوْاْ|strove|71|101|12141$فِىٓ|against|68|98|89$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Verses,|97|127|1344$مُعَـٰجِزِينَ|(to) cause failure,|140|170|12142$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|97|51$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|356|409$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) the Hellfire.|126|320|1107$

2647.verse: وَمَآ|And not|72|81|46$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|101|1342$مِن قَبْلِكَ|before you|102|121|47$مِن|any|50|69|53$رَّسُولٍ|Messenger|90|109|9517$وَلَا|and not|71|90|25$نَبِىٍّ|a Prophet|84|103|3345$إِلَّآ|but|42|51|86$إِذَا|when|55|64|1370$تَمَنَّىٰٓ|he recited,|92|110|12143$أَلْقَى|threw|61|79|4332$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan|105|123|379$فِىٓ|in|48|66|89$أُمْنِيَّتِهِۦ|his recitation.|111|129|12144$فَيَنسَخُ ٱللَّهُ|But Allah abolishes|143|152|12145$مَا|what|53|64|262$يُلْقِى|throws|65|87|12146$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan,|110|132|379$ثُمَّ|then|50|72|293$يُحْكِمُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah will establish|139|161|12147$ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ‌ۗ|His Verses.|93|115|706$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|92|167$عَلِيمٌ|(is) All-Knower,|122|360|307$حَكِيمٌ|All-Wise.|78|316|1828$

2648.verse: لِّيَجْعَلَ|That He may make|144|152|4778$مَا|what|53|68|262$يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan throws|155|170|12148$فِتْنَةً|a trial|58|73|7216$لِّلَّذِينَ|for those|80|95|750$فِى|in|48|63|89$قُلُوبِهِم|their hearts|97|104|66$مَّرَضٌ|(is) a disease,|114|132|90$وَٱلْقَاسِيَةِ|and (are) hardened|148|183|12149$قُلُوبُهُمْ‌ۗ|their hearts.|102|137|1096$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|133|713$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers|123|140|377$لَفِى|(are) surely, in|118|224|1513$شِقَاقِۭ|schism|71|284|1246$بَعِيدٍ|far.|60|166|1514$

2649.verse: وَلِيَعْلَمَ|And that may know|149|156|3476$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$أُوتُواْ|have been given|129|144|940$ٱلْعِلْمَ|the knowledge|116|131|9942$أَنَّهُ|that it|62|77|267$ٱلْحَقُّ|(is) the truth|107|114|268$مِن|from|50|56|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord,|87|100|1322$فَيُؤْمِنُواْ|and they believe|130|142|12150$بِهِۦ|in it,|52|64|204$فَتُخْبِتَ|and may humbly submit|175|188|12151$لَهُۥ|to it|54|66|977$قُلُوبُهُمْ‌ۗ|their hearts.|102|108|1096$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|113|713$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|84|184$لَهَادِ|(is) surely (the) Guide|166|197|12152$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|150|20$ءَامَنُوٓاْ|believe,|82|113|84$إِلَىٰ|to|53|68|118$صِرَٲطٍ|a Path|89|340|1271$مُّسْتَقِيمٍ|Straight.|85|336|1272$

2642.verse: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.

2643.verse: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.

2644.verse: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."

2645.verse: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.

2646.verse: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.

2647.verse: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

2648.verse: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.

2649.verse: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.

2650.verse: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.
